info.name: LMS Learning Management System API
info.description: Complete API collection for LMS Backend with Admin and Client endpoints

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Advanced JavaScript Course",
  "description": "Learn advanced JavaScript concepts",
  "shortDescription": "Master JS advanced features",
  "domain": "Programming",
  "level": "advanced",
  "price": 99.99,
  "instructorId": "{{instructor_id}}",
  "tags": ["javascript", "programming", "web"],
  "prerequisites": ["Basic JavaScript knowledge"],
  "benefits": ["Advanced JS skills", "Better job opportunities"]
}

{
  "courseId": "{{course_id}}",
  "title": "Introduction to Course",
  "description": "This section provides an overview of the course content",
  "order": 1,
  "isVisible": true
}

{
  "sectionId": "{{section_id}}",
  "courseId": "{{course_id}}",
  "title": "Introduction Lesson",
  "content": "This is the lesson content",
  "type": "text",
  "order": 1,
  "isRequired": true,
  "isPreview": false,
  "estimatedTime": 30
}

{
  "title": "Updated Lesson Title",
  "content": "Updated lesson content",
  "order": 2,
  "isRequired": true,
  "isPreview": false,
  "estimatedTime": 45
}
